//UserInput.js import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { validateUserInput } from './util/user_input/validate_input.js' const UserInput = () =>{ const [userInput, setUserInput] = useState({ company:'', position:'', date:'', location:'', url:'' }); const handleClear = () => { //Remove all the text from the umput fields setUserInput({ company:'', position:'', date:'', location:'', url:'' }); }; const handleAddJob = (e) => { // 'e'=event object //e.preventDefault //Stops browser's default form submission which refreshes the page. Essential for React form handling //Validate User Input const errorList = validateUserInput(userInput) }; return(
setUserInput({...userInput, company:e.target.value})} />
setUserInput({...userInput, position:e.target.value})} />
setUserInput({...userInput, date:e.target.value})} />
setUserInput({...userInput, location:e.target.value})} />
setUserInput({...UserInput, url:e.target.value})} />
); }; export default UserInput;
